 @param _employeeAddress - The address of the employee.

addEmployee(address,string).notice: - This function is used to add a employee to the organization owned by an employer.

changeAccess(address).notice: - This function is used to change the access of an employee.

createEmployer(string).notice: - This function is used to create a new employer/owner

deleteEmployee(address).notice: - This function is used to delete/make inactive an employee

fetchAssessmentQuestions(uint8).notice: - Fetch IPFS URL of course ID

fetchCourses().notice: - Fetch course list based on user type

fetchEmployees().notice: - This function is used to determine if the user is an employee of an organization.

getTopPerformers(uint8).notice: - Fetches top performers based on total completion percentage

getUserName(address).notice: - This function is used to retrieve the username based on wallet address

getUserType(address).notice: - This function is used to determine the type of user 1 = employer. 2 = employee. 3 = unenrolled

loadTestData().notice: - Quick load test data for testing
